commit.message:
tree.h (struct tree_decl_minimal): Move pt_uid ...

2010-04-16  Richard Guenther  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* tree.h (struct tree_decl_minimal): Move pt_uid ...

	(DECL_PT_UID): Adjust.
	(SET_DECL_PT_UID): Likewise.
	(DECL_PT_UID_SET_P): Likewise.

From-SVN: r158421
